quote.text: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.
quote.author: Louisa May Alcott

scripture.text: Now the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that ye may abound in hope, through the power of the Holy Ghost

message:
Ms Sunshine ‚òÄÔ∏è

Hey ms sunshine, As the stars paint the sky tonight, I just want you to feel how deeply you are cared for, not just by me but by the God who gives peace, joy, and hope even in the silent hours... May this night bring rest to your soul after a long day at work, and may you drift into dreams wrapped in light and love. Sleep gently... I'm proud of youüåô‚ú®
